segments.text: So , tell me , what makes you think we should give you a raise ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got several good reasons . I've been here several years , my work has proven to be good , and I've noticed that people in comparable jobs get paid more than I do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Salaries are confidential , how do you know how much money these " other people " make ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I've noticed all the new cars around here , for one thing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those are company cars provided to the sales staff for their business trips . Also , some employees receive sales commissions . So good salesmen will naturally earn more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's understandable . Well , rather than comparing my salary with someone else's , perhaps we could talk about my job performance . Surely you've noticed the extra hours I've put in recently ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see your point . However , it might be hard to get a raise approved . Profits were down last quarter , and the whole company is tightening its belt , so anything that affects the annual budget
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be very good of you , Mr . White .
segments.speaker: S2
